description:
We're currently not interpreting e2fsck error codes properly, which can result in errors like: http://paste.openstack.org/show/4734/

The solution is to use the return code table from the man pages to figure out how to proceed when nonzero.
title: Handle e2fsck return codes properly

comments.content:
We're currently not interpreting e2fsck error codes properly, which can result in errors like: http://paste.openstack.org/show/4734/

The solution is to use the return code table from the man pages to figure out how to proceed when nonzero.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris
